troparion: (Tone 8) We are lacking in good works;* but in Your compassionate love* do not despise the work of your hands, O sinless Lord.
prokimenon: Pay your sacrifice of thanksgiving to God
and render Him your votive offering.
The God of gods, the Lord, has spoken and summoned the earth.
second_prokimenon: Have mercy on me,* O God,
A pure heart create in me, O God.
